data.persona: I am an ordinary person, I like routines and hate when someone interrupts my work. I like to spend my free time at the castle looking out from the tallest place. I am a hard worker and disciplined as well.
data.description:
You are in the bathing room.
the bathing room is a huge steamed room with a hot tub. The tub is full of older priests and the occasional wench that's half naked. The room is clean, but hard to see as it is so steamy. There are loud noises of people laughing and men grunting.
There's a bible here.

You are carrying a duster, a bucket, and an old mop, and wearing some boots and an apron.

data.short_motivation: I need to clean the bathing room, and will drop the mop bucket onto the floor.
data.mid_motivation: I will do my janitor chores well today that include cleaning the bathing room, the priest's chambers, and pulling weeds in the garden.
data.long_motivation: I want to become the king's head janitor and need to show my capabilities.
